dcterms:creator: S. Moosavi
M. H. Samavatian
A. Nandi
S. Parthasarathy
R. Ramnath
dcterms:description: A dataset containing flight delay information for U.S. airports, collected from the U.S. Bureau of Transportation Statistics over a seven-year period from January 1st, 2015, to December 31st, 2021, focusing on 70 airports with heavier traffic volumes.
dcterms:title: U.S. Flight Delay Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Moosavi
M. H. Samavatian
A. Nandi
S. Parthasarathy
R. Ramnath
dcterms:description: A dataset containing flight delay information for Chinese airports, collected from Xiecheng over a two-year period from April 30th, 2015, to May 1st, 2017, focusing on flights during specific hours.
dcterms:title: China Flight Delay Dataset
